address.address: C34, Dr BR Ambedkar Rd, below OYO Townhouse, Sector 15, Vasundhara, Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh 201012

faqs.question: What cuisines are served at 34 Masala Lane?
faqs.answer: The main cuisine served at 34 Masala Lane is Multicuisine.

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane serve pure vegetarian dishes?
faqs.answer: No, 34 Masala Lane serves both veg and non-veg dishes.

faqs.question: What are the operational timings of 34 Masala Lane?
faqs.answer: 34 Masala Lane restaurant operational timing for today: 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane serve buffet?
faqs.answer: No, 34 Masala Lane does not serve buffet.

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane restaurant have a bar or serve alcohol?
faqs.answer: No, 34 Masala Lane does not serve alcohol.

faqs.question: Does 34 Masala Lane restaurant play live music?
faqs.answer: Yes, 34 Masala Lane plays live music.

faqs.question: What are the best and must-try dishes at 34 Masala Lane?
faqs.answer: Dishes like Paneer Achari Tikka,Methi Malai Matar are some of the must-try dishes at 34 Masala Lane.

extraOptions.highlights: Embark on a culinary journey to India at 34 Masala Lane, a pure vegetarian fine dining restaurant.

packages.content:
Buffet Inclusion:

*Menu changes on a daily basis. All items listed are subject to availability and changes.

Menu Inclusions :

  • 20 Types of Salads and Indian Chaats
  • 2 Types of Soup
  • 6 Types of Appetisers
  • 3 Types of Cheese Platters

Live Counters :

  • Gol Guppa and Chaat Counter
  • Pasta Counter
  • South Indian Counter
  • Dal Tadka and Dal Makhani Counter
  • Mongolian Counter

Main Course :

  • 8 Types of Indian Main Course
  • 4 Types of Continental Main Course
  • 4 Types of Oriental Main Course
  • 6 Types of Raita/Aachaar/Papad
  • 6 Types of Breads

Desserts :

  • 10 Types of Confectionary Desserts
  • 6 Types of Indian Mithaai
  • 4 Types of Ice-cream
  • 5 Types of Fresh Cut Fruits

Assorted Soft Beverages
packages.title: Delux Party Package
packages.menuDetail:
Free Cancellation

One click cancellation available within 30 days of purchase

Timings

Sunday          Not Valid

Monday         12:30 PM – 3:30 PM

Tuesday         12:30 PM – 3:30 PM

Wednesday    12:30 PM – 3:30 PM

Thursday        12:30 PM – 3:30 PM

Friday             12:30 PM – 3:30 PM

Saturday         Not Valid

Applicable on

Valid For: Dine-in

Not Valid for: Takeaway, Home Delivery

Use this within

30 days of purchase

How to use offer

  • Carry your email voucher on phone or access it under the ‘purchases’ section of the app
  • Make prior reservation before you visit the merchant
  • Merchant verifies the voucher or you can redeem it yourself using the app

Things to remember

  • IMP : ONLY A GROUP OF MAXIMUM 10 PEOPLE CAN AVAIL THE OFFER AT ONE TIME
  • Prior reservations mandatory
  • Cannot be clubbed with any other offer
  • All local / national laws with respect to legal drinking age apply on this voucher
  • Not valid on Days of Special Events, please refer to Black out Dates for this offer

nodes.title: Pets are not allowed on the premises.
Guests are required to respect the property and cover any damages caused by them during their visit.
Sale and consumption of alcohol, including adherence to legal drinking age requirements and responsible service practices.
Smoking is prohibited within the premises, in compliance with local laws.

data.title: 34 Masala Lane Demo
data.content: Indulge in authentic Indian flavors amidst a cozy ambiance, perfect for family gatherings, social outings, or corporate events. Our chefs meticulously craft each dish to tantalize your taste buds, leaving you with an unforgettable dining experience.

seo.title: 34 Masala Lane Demo - Book My Party
